status.emptyAddress: Please enter the Cardano Connect address.
status.invalidAddress: The input does not seem to be a valid direct connect address.
status.noaccount: Please select an account to use.
status.nowallets: Please add a wallet to use cardano connect.

actions.connect: Wallet is disconnected. Click to connect to the DApp.
actions.disconnect: Wallet is connected. Click to disconnect from the DApp.

badge.autoconnect: The wallet will try to auto connect to this DApp upon start.
badge.connected: The DApp is currently connected to the wallet.
badge.disconnected: The DApp is currently not connected to the wallet.

identicon.description:
This image, called identicon, is created from the connection between your wallet and the DApp.
The image should be identical on both sites; please compare them to ensure your connection has not been compromised.

connect.headline: Connect dApp using CardanoConnect
connect.caption:
You can connect to any dApp that is implementing the CIP-0045 cardano web connect protocol. 
To do so please enter the address or scan the QR code that the dApp is showing.
